channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These are my favorite Switch 2 accessories
item.description: The Switch 2 can be enjoyed right out of the box, but it’s even better with the right accessories. Some of these add-ons are more crucial than others, especially if you’re deciding what to buy early on. For example, a case and a screen protector can keep your console safe from scuffs, scratches, and drops, […]

item.title: Perplexity says its AI personal shopper ‘puts you first’
item.description: Perplexity is ramping up its AI shopping experience going into the holiday season, just like OpenAI and Google, with a free AI-powered shopping feature that is available now to US users. Its AI assistant looks similar to what we’ve seen from ChatGPT’s shopping research, as users type in what they’re looking for and refine the […]

item.title: NASA’s $4.5 Billion Starliner Deal With Boeing Cut to Just 4 Flights After Embarrassing Failures
item.description: The capsule will fly a cargo mission to the ISS early next year, with no crew on board this time.

item.title: AI Teddy Bear That Talked Fetishes and Knives Is Back on the Market
item.description: The toymakers say they've worked out the kinks (literally) and the bear is safe to use again.

item.title: Exclusive: Inside Disney’s most high-tech light parade ever
item.description: TechRadar went behind the scenes with Disney’s parade team to reveal how the magic — and engineering — powers Disney Starlight: Dream the Night Away each night, Magic Kingdom’s first new nighttime parade in years, with ten floats carrying more than half a million LEDs.

item.title: ‘Tron’ Just Can’t Stop Dying
item.description: After the disappointing release of 'Tron: Ares,' a new Hasbro toy set will not be happening either.

item.title: Suno AI Rep Turns the Internet Against Suno AI With One Simple Post
item.description: Finally, someone is making singing affordable.

item.title: The Core i7-14650HX inside this $480 Windows 11 PC is way faster than Apple's $1399 Mac mini M4 Pro CPU and it's my Black Friday PC bargain pick
item.description: Abytespark Tower Business Desktop is just $480 for Black Friday and its Core i7-14650HX CPU is far faster than Apple’s $1,399 Mac Mini M4 Pro.

item.title: Find Your Grind raises $5M to grow platform empowering students to explore unique career paths
item.description: Nick Gross says that Find Your Grind gives students the tools to explore what careers are out there and what paths suit their strengths, interests, and visions for what they want their futures to look like.

item.title: Alienware Aurora Gaming Desktop Review: Great Value
item.description: With a loop of light on the front and great overall value, this Alienware prebuilt gaming PC is an easy way into desktop gaming.

item.title: The Panasonic Z95B OLED is one of the best TVs I tested, and it’s hit a record-low price for Black Friday
item.description: Amazon's Black Friday deal on the Panasonic Z95B has landed, bringing one of 2025's top OLED TVs down to a very competitive price.

item.title: Black Friday Week : le OnePlus 13R, avec sa batterie digne d’un marathonien, perd 250 €
item.description: Plus abordable que le OnePlus 13, le OnePlus 13R présente tout de même une fiche technique solide sur quasiment tous les aspects. Pour le découvrir, son constructeur le fait passer de 769 euros à 519 euros.

item.title: Amazon's Black Friday Kindle deals drop my 2 favorite e-readers, the Kindle Scribe and Kindle Colorsoft, to their lowest prices ever - these are the deals I've been waiting for!
item.description: My 2 top Kindle devices - the Amazon Kindle Colorsoft and Kindle Scribe (2024) - get a Black Friday discount that drops them to the lowest prices I've seen.

item.title: Wyze’s new security camera watches your yard from inside your home
item.description: Wyze has announced an unorthodox approach to outdoor security cameras with its new Window Cam that monitors your yard and property from inside your home. This Rear Window approach to security means the camera doesn’t need batteries, Wi-Fi range extenders, access to an exterior power outlet, or weatherproofing. The company already offers window mounts for […]...

item.title: Test du Dreame V20 Pro-A : un peu d’ombre à Dyson
item.description: On a l'habitude de payer 800 euros pour avoir le privilège d'un aspirateur balai haut de gamme. Dreame arrive, pose son V20 Pro à peine au-dessus des 300 euros, et se permet d'ajouter des options que les leaders n'ont même pas, comme un bras robotisé pour les plinthes. Sur le papier, c'est l'affaire du siècle. En réalité, est-ce que ça vaut vraiment le coup de lâcher les grandes marques comme Dyson ? On va voir ça. ...

item.title: Grab an 8TB SSD for 4.8¢ per Gigabyte, an all-time low, in an extraordinary price bloodbath ahead of Black Friday
item.description: The Crucial X10 offers plenty of storage and has a sleek, modern design and it is at its lowest price ever this Black Friday.

item.title: L’un des plus grands télescopes de l’histoire pourrait finalement être construit… à deux pas de chez nous, en Europe !
item.description: Le projet du Thirty Meter Telescope (TMT), un télescope terrestre de 30 mètres de diamètre, envisagé initialement sur le Mauna Kea à Hawaï, pourrait désormais voir le jour sur l'île de La Palma en Espagne. Cette décision s'expliquerait par un manque de soutien financier de la National Science...

item.description: These over-ear headphones compete with the Airpods Max at a fraction of the price.

item.description: Edgerton played Uncle Owen in 'Attack of the Clones,' 'Revenge of the Sith,' and Disney+ series 'Obi-Wan Kenobi.'

item.title: Bose and Sony headphones are up to $200 off in the run-up to Black Friday
item.description: There’s no better time to save on headphones and earbuds than Black Friday. We’ve been covering deals on audio gear all year, and right now we’re seeing some fantastic discounts on new and old releases, including models from Apple, Sony, Bose, Sonos, and more. For example, we’re currently seeing the best prices to date on […]

item.title: How to watch Man City vs Bayer Leverkusen for *FREE* — Stream Champions League 2025-26
item.description: Here's our quick guide on how to watch Man City vs Bayer Leverkusen in the Champions League 2025-26 for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Does AI have a role to play in mental health treament?
item.description: Ellie Pavlick, director of a new institute dedicated to exploring AI and mental health, and Soraya Darabi of VC firm TMV, an early investor in mental health AI startups, discuss whether AI can help with mental health treatments—and what guardrails are necessary. In recent weeks, OpenAI has faced seven lawsuits alleging that ChatGPT contributed to suicides or mental health breakdowns. In a recent conversation at the Innovation@Brown Showcase, Brown University’s Ellie Pavlick, director of a new institute dedicated to exploring AI and mental health, and Soraya Darabi of VC firm TMV, an early inve...

item.title: Cheese recall hits grocery stores nationwide right before Thanksgiving
item.description: Ambriola Company has recalled select Pecorino Romano SKUs sold across the U.S. Consumers are urged to inspect their packages immediately. Just days before Thanksgiving, as Americans shop at supermarkets nationwide for their holiday meals, Ambriola Company, which makes some Boar’s Head products, has issued a recall for select pecorino romano cheese products due to possible contamination from listeria. ...

item.title: Boeing’s troubled Starliner won’t carry astronauts on its next mission
item.description: The capsule had so many problems that NASA ordered it to come back empty, leaving the astronauts stuck there for more than nine months. Boeing and NASA have agreed to keep astronauts off the company’s next Starliner flight and instead perform a trial run with cargo to prove its safety.

item.title: Best Black Friday Mattress Deals 2025
item.description: Some of the best sales of the year are happening right now—rest up before the holiday rush with a new bed.

item.title: The Trump Administration just launched its own plan for global AI dominance and what could go wrong?
item.description: The Trump White House's Genesis Mission spells out a plan to build a government-based AI platform. But who will it serve?

item.title: Walgreens Recalls Saline Nasal Spray Over Bacteria Contamination Concerns
item.description: Over 41,000 bottles have been recalled.

item.title: Meta’s new Ray-Ban trade-in program lets you swap your AirPods for smart glasses – but there’s a catch

item.title: Signal déploie sa fonction de sauvegarde des conversations sur iOS et Android : comment en profiter gratuitement ?
item.description: Bien décidé à venir concurrencer WhatsApp sur le terrain des applis de discussions instantanées, Signal vient de déployer largement sa fonction de sauvegarde des discussions pour ne plus perdre vos messages préférés.

item.description: Score a great Black Friday deal on these great home office hardware offers.

item.title: Ce n’est pas fini : la surveillance de vos messages privés pourrait revenir en Europe
item.description: Après une longue mobilisation, Bruxelles a formellement écarté son projet de surveillance automatique des messageries privées. Mais si le règlement Chat Control a été évacué, il pourrait bien revenir par la petite porte.
